description:
Rear garden tree works subject to LBI TPO 219 2000 

 Works:  Sycamore (T1):  Very sensitively remove the                         horizontal laterals growing directly                         across and towards Harford Mews (do                         not reduce the height of the tree),                         carefully crown thin the upper                         branches by 20% retaining all those                         lower branches that screen the new                         development from Tavistock Terrace,                         deadwood.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: All the tree work is to be carried out by a competent Tree Surgeon to the recommendation of BS3998: 1989 'Tree Work'. 

 REASON: To protect the health and stability of trees to be retained on the site, and to ensure that a satisfactory standard of visual amenity is provided and maintained.
